content.question: Which of the following data would provide the strongest evidence to support the assertion that HBCUs allowed many African Americans to rise out of poverty?

choices.label: The data regarding students joining community service clubs at HBCUs
The data regarding scholarship recipients by gender at HBCUs
The data regarding students’ access to education and training at HBCUs
The data regarding racial makeup of student populations at HBCUs

content.answer: The data regarding students’ access to education and training at HBCUs

topic.text: 3.10: HBCUs, Black Greek Letter Organizations, and Black Education

skill.text: 3.B: Support a claim or argument using specific and relevant evidence.
